rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain which must be DM.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.SUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Subject identifier, which must be unique within the study. Often the ID of the subject as recorded on a CRF.
datasetVariables.label: Subject Identifier for the Study
datasetVariables.name: SUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.RFSTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Reference Start Date/time for the subject in ISO 8601 character format. Usually equivalent to date/time when subject was first exposed to study treatment. Required for all randomized subjects; will be null for all subjects who did not meet the milestone the date requires, such as screen failures or unassigned subjects.
datasetVariables.label: Subject Reference Start Date/Time
datasetVariables.name: RFSTDTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.RFENDTC

datasetVariables.description: Reference End Date/time for the subject in ISO 8601 character format. Usually equivalent to the date/time when subject was determined to have ended the trial, and often equivalent to date/time of last exposure to study treatment. Required for all randomized subjects; null for screen failures or unassigned subjects.
datasetVariables.label: Subject Reference End Date/Time
datasetVariables.name: RFENDTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.SITEID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a site within a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Site Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SITEID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.INVID

datasetVariables.description: An identifier to describe the Investigator for the study. May be used in addition to the SITEID. Not needed if SITEID is equivalent to INVID.
datasetVariables.label: Investigator Identifier
datasetVariables.name: INVID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.INVNAM

datasetVariables.description: Name of the investigator for a site.
datasetVariables.label: Investigator Name
datasetVariables.name: INVNAM

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.BRTHDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of birth of the subject in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Birth
datasetVariables.name: BRTHDTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.AGE

datasetVariables.description: Age expressed in AGEU. May be derived as (RFSTDTC-BRTHDTC), but BRTHDTC may not be available in all cases (due to subject privacy concerns).
datasetVariables.label: Age
datasetVariables.name: AGE

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.AGEU

datasetVariables.description: Units associated with AGE.
datasetVariables.label: Age Units
datasetVariables.name: AGEU

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.SEX

datasetVariables.description: Sex of the subject.
datasetVariables.label: Sex
datasetVariables.name: SEX

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.RACE

datasetVariables.description: Race of the subject. Sponsors should refer to "Collection of Race and Ethnicity Data in Clinical Trials" (FDA, September 2005) for guidance regarding the collection of race (http://www.fda.gov/cder/guidance/5656fnl.htm)
datasetVariables.label: Race
datasetVariables.name: RACE

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.ETHNIC

datasetVariables.description: The ethnicity of the subject. Sponsors should refer to "Collection of Race and Ethnicity Data in Clinical Trials" (FDA, September 2005) for guidance regarding the collection of ethnicity (http://www.fda.gov/cder/guidance/5656fnl.htm).
datasetVariables.label: Ethnicity
datasetVariables.name: ETHNIC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.ARMCD

datasetVariables.description: ARMCD is limited to 20 characters and does not have special character restrictions.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Arm Code
datasetVariables.name: ARMCD

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.ARM

datasetVariables.description: Name of the Arm to which the subject was assigned.
datasetVariables.label: Description of Planned Arm
datasetVariables.name: ARM

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.COUNTRY

datasetVariables.description: Country of the investigational site at which the subject participated in the trial in ISO 3166 three-character format.
datasetVariables.label: Country
datasetVariables.name: COUNTRY

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.DMDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of collection of the demographic information in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Collection
datasetVariables.name: DMDTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable DM.DMDY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of collection measured as integer days. Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Collection
datasetVariables.name: DMDY

datasets.description: A special-purpose domain that includes a set of essential standard variables that describe each subject in a clinical study. It is the parent domain for all other observations for human clinical subjects. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49572, 2018-06-29)
datasets.label: Subject Demographics
datasets.name: DM

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain which must be CO.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.RDOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Domain Abbreviation of the parent record(s). Null for records collected on general comments or additional information CRF page.
datasetVariables.label: Related Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: RDOMAIN

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.COSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number to ensure uniqueness within a domain. Should be assigned to be in a consistent chronological order.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: COSEQ

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.IDVAR

datasetVariables.description: Identifying variable in the parent dataset that identifies the record(s) to which the comment applies. Examples AESEQ or CMGRPID. Used only when individual comments are related to domain records. Null for comments collected on separate CRFs.
datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable
datasetVariables.name: IDVAR

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.IDVARVAL

datasetVariables.description: Value of identifying variable of the parent record(s). Null for comments collected on separate CRFs.
datasetVariables.label: Identifying Variable Value
datasetVariables.name: IDVARVAL

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.COREF

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference associated with the comment. May be the CRF page number (e.g. 650), or a module name (e.g. DEMOG), or a combination of information that identifies the reference (e.g. 650-VITALS-VISIT 2).
datasetVariables.label: Comment Reference
datasetVariables.name: COREF

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.COVAL

datasetVariables.description: The text of the comment. Text over 200 characters can be added to additional columns COVAL1-COVALn.
datasetVariables.label: Comment
datasetVariables.name: COVAL

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.COEVAL

datasetVariables.description: Used to describe the originator of the comment. Example: CENTRAL REVIEWER.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: COEVAL

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable CO.CODTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/time of comment on dedicated comment form, if collected. Represented in ISO 8601 character format. Should be null if this is a child record of another domain or if comment date was not collected.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Comment
datasetVariables.name: CODTC

datasets.description: A special-purpose domain that contains comments that may be collected alongside other data. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49569, 2018-06-29)
datasets.label: Comments
datasets.name: CO

datasets.datasetStructure: One Record per Actual Element per Subject

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study. .
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain which must be SE.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.SESEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number to ensure uniqueness within dataset. Should be assigned to be in a consistent chronological order.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: SESEQ

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.ETCD

datasetVariables.description: ETCD (the companion to ELEMENT) is limited to 8 characters and does not have special character restrictions. These values should be short for ease of use in programming, but it is not expected that ETCD will need to serve as a variable name.
datasetVariables.label: Subject Element Code
datasetVariables.name: ETCD

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.ELEMENT

datasetVariables.description: The name of the Element. If ETCD has a value of "UNPLAN" then ELEMENT should be Null.
datasetVariables.label: Description of Subject Element
datasetVariables.name: ELEMENT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.SESTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Start date/time for an Element for each subject, represented in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: Start Date/Time of Element
datasetVariables.name: SESTDTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.SEENDTC

datasetVariables.description: End date/time of an Element for each subject, represented in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: End Date/Time of Element
datasetVariables.name: SEENDTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.TAETORD

self.title: Planned Order of Elements within Arm

datasetVariables.description: Number that gives the planned order of the Element within the subject's assigned ARM.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Order of Elements within Arm
datasetVariables.name: TAETORD

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.EPOCH

datasetVariables.description: Epoch associated with the Element in the planned sequence of Elements for the ARM to which the subject was assigned
datasetVariables.label: Epoch
datasetVariables.name: EPOCH

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SE.SEUPDES

datasetVariables.description: Description of what happened to the subject during an unplanned Element. Used only if ETCD has the value of "UNPLAN".
datasetVariables.label: Description of Unplanned Element
datasetVariables.name: SEUPDES

datasets.description: A special-purpose domain that contains the actual order of elements followed by the subject, together with the start date/time and end date/time for each element. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49616, 2018-06-29)
datasets.label: Subject Elements
datasets.name: SE

datasets.datasetStructure: One Record per Subject Visit, per Subject

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain, which must be SV.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.VISITNUM

datasetVariables.description: Clinical encounter number. (Decimal numbering may be useful for inserting unplanned visits.) Numeric version of VISIT, used for sorting.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Number
datasetVariables.name: VISITNUM

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.VISIT

datasetVariables.description: Protocol-defined description of clinical encounter or description of unplanned visit. May be used in addition to VISITNUM and/or VISITDY as a text description of the clinical encounter.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Name
datasetVariables.name: VISIT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.VISITDY

datasetVariables.description: Planned study day of the start of the visit based upon RFSTDTC in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Study Day of Visit
datasetVariables.name: VISITDY

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.SVSTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Start date/time for a subject's visit, represented in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: Start Date/Time of Visit
datasetVariables.name: SVSTDTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.SVENDTC

datasetVariables.description: End date/time of a subject's visit, represented in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: End Date/Time of Visit
datasetVariables.name: SVENDTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.SVSTDY

self.title: Study Day of Start of Visit

datasetVariables.description: Study day of start of visit relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Start of Visit
datasetVariables.name: SVSTDY

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.SVENDY

self.title: Study Day of End of Visit

datasetVariables.description: Study day of end of visit relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of End of Visit
datasetVariables.name: SVENDY

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTM variable SV.SVUPDES

datasetVariables.description: Description of what happened to the subject during an unplanned visit. Null for protocol-defined visits.
datasetVariables.label: Description of Unplanned Visit
datasetVariables.name: SVUPDES

datasets.description: A special-purpose domain that contains the actual start and end data/time for each visit of each individual subject. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49617, 2018-06-29)
datasets.label: Subject Visits
datasets.name: SV

description: This SDTM class contains a set of domains which do not conform to the Findings, Events or Interventions observation classes. The domains included are DM, CO, SE and SV. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, GNRLOBSC, C103377, 2018-06-29)
label: Special-Purpose Datasets
name: Special-Purpose
